manualInstructions.text:
Your Cosmos kernel project has been created!

Getting Started:

1. Build for x64:
   dotnet publish -r linux-x64

2. Build for ARM64:
   dotnet publish -r linux-arm64

3. Test with QEMU (x64):
   qemu-system-x86_64 -cdrom ./output-x64/KernelName.iso -m 512M -serial stdio

4. Test with QEMU (ARM64):
   qemu-system-aarch64 -M virt -cpu cortex-a72 -m 512M -bios /usr/share/qemu-efi-aarch64/QEMU_EFI.fd -cdrom ./output-arm64/KernelName.iso -serial stdio

Architecture is auto-detected from RuntimeIdentifier. Switch anytime without reinstalling packages!

Documentation: https://github.com/valentinbreiz/nativeaot-patcher
